hero.title: MSK Assistant
hero.subtitle: Get personalized support for your cancer care journey. Our AI assistant can help you navigate scheduling, resources, and more.

chat.disclaimer: This chat provides information only. For medical advice or emergencies, contact your care team or call 911.
chat.welcome:
Hi there — welcome to MSK Assistant.

Not sure where to start? That's okay — we can figure it out together. I can walk you through screenings, appointments, costs, or finding support. No medical jargon, just simple answers and clear steps so you feel confident about what comes next.

And don't worry — we don't keep or use any personal information you share here.
chat.chooseLanguage: Please choose your preferred language to continue:
chat.languageConfirm: Great! I'll assist you in {language}. How can I help you today?

safety.piiDetected: For your privacy, please don't share personal information like phone numbers or addresses. Our team can help you with this information directly.
